title: How to Add Forums to a Website

steps.title: Choose which method you want to use.
steps.content: Choose which method you want to use. Embeddable forums (hosted on some else server, generally forum service provider) Installing forum scripts like phpBB (hosted on your server)

steps.title: Set up the forum on a forum service providers website (Google for it and select one you like)
steps.content: Set up the forum on a forum service providers website (Google for it and select one you like)

steps.title: Get the HTML code (one shown in screen-shot) to embed it on your website and that's it your forum is live.
steps.content: Get the HTML code (one shown in screen-shot) to embed it on your website and that's it your forum is live. (use a separate page for forum)

steps.title: Get a Forum Software package like phpBB, Vanilla, MyBB or vBulletin(or something similar).
steps.content: Get a Forum Software package like phpBB, Vanilla, MyBB or vBulletin(or something similar).

steps.title: Install the software with appropriate database and settings(get help from script providers website)
steps.content: Install the software with appropriate database and settings(get help from script providers website)

steps.title: Once done, link your forum to your website.
steps.content: Once done, link your forum to your website.
